0: Kellogg Co. is recalling more than 11 million boxes of Honey Smacks cereal in what is the eighth multistate outbreak this year of food-borne illnesses caused by the salmonella bacteria. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Food regulators said 73 people in 31 states have been infected by salmonella linked to Honey Smacks since March. Twenty-four of those people were hospitalized.
